title: 4: No Such Thing As The Mountains of Kong
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) and Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) discuss cavemen, spiders, fictitious mountains and immortal souls.
contentSnippet: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) and Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) discuss cavemen, spiders, fictitious mountains and immortal souls.
